name: There's No Going Back - Ludum Dare 34 Entry
name_original: There's No Going Back - Ludum Dare 34 Entry
description:
There's No Going Back is a puzzle platformer where you cannot move backwards. Made for the Ludum Dare 34 game jam, the game was made in 48 hours by one person. There may be future plans to develop this further.

You can view the soundtrack here
